name: The Spectrals
declaringWar: I'm sorry but, I have to remove you from this plane of existence. Sorry again!
attacked: D-do you think I'm not kind enough? Why, why?!
defeated: M-maybe I should've trained myself better for this, h-hehe
introduction: Hiya! My name is Purplus, I hope we'll be friends!
tradeRequest: Hehehe, this trade should be beneficial for both of us!
uniques: [+40]% Production when constructing [Happiness] buildings [in all non-occupied cities] <when not at war>

_civilopediaText.text: A ghost who's assigned to guard the gates to Desion Land. Bue due to lack of visitors, she decided to took an offer to be a leader, somehow!

name: The Silks
declaringWar: I hereby apologize, but you're in our way! Prepare yourselves!
attacked: Haha, what a surprise! Well, I'm looking forward for you losing this!
defeated: Hahaha! You fought this war very well! I, Pita, leader of The Silks, officially concedes.
introduction: My name's Pita, the Silks leader. I hope you're fine with me as a spider!
tradeRequest: I hope this nets profits for both of us.
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities connected to capital]
[+1 Production] for [Bonus resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]

name: The Pollens
hateHello: There are no free honey for you!
declaringWar: I'm sorry, but your presence distrupts our ecosystem. Please die!
attacked: Are you kidding? Hehe, let me tell you, you won't win this!
defeated: H-hehehehe, h-hehehehe! Y-you f-fought so well! I-I give up!
introduction: Hehe, my name is Hanny! Here, have some honey, those are free!
tradeRequest: C'mon, this is a beneficial trade, trust me!
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Desion
declaringWar: You're so annoying, we must get rid of you!
attacked: Hmm, we see you're interested in war. Well, we hope it goes well for all of us.
defeated: Alas, I've fallen, heh. I hope my empire is in better state in your hands.
introduction: Hello there, my namecode is A. I don't reveal my name to strangers, heh
tradeRequest: What do you think about our offer?
uniques: Receive free [Great Artist] when you discover [Philosophy]

name: The Beakers
declaringWar: You pest, we angry. Must exterminate!
defeated: You conqueror. I'm amazed. Take care.
introduction: Name's Chrome, Beakers' leader. Apologize, dislikes chatter.
uniques: Provides a [Alchemy] in your first [3] cities for free

name: The Knights
declaringWar: It is unfortunate of how profitable it is due to many bounties placed on you. Sorry, but you must die!
attacked: My next target attacks me, huh? Well, this will surely become an interesting match!
defeated: You're so good at this, I feel honored to be beaten by your nation.
introduction: My name is Sid of the Knights. We're running knight errands daily, join while you can!
tradeRequest: Take this offer bud, it'll be worthwhile for both of us.

name: Drake
declaringWar: Heheheheh, your pitiful army won't stand up against mine. Prepare to die!
attacked: Foolish, foolish! Do you think you have what it takes on Drake? I don't believe you, hah!
defeated: Urgh, you, you! Gaaah, I surrender! You should be the dragon, not me!
introduction: My name is Hatred of Drake. Be aware of your manners, otherwise I will strike you, hah!
